sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-container fluid="sm" class="w-50">
        <b-form-checkbox 
            v-for="resident in savedResidents" 
            :key="resident" 
            v-model="checkedList" 
            :value="resident"
        >            
                {{ resident }}
        </b-form-checkbox>
        <b-button v-if="checkedList.length > 0" variant="danger" @click="removeResident">Remove</b-button>
    </b-container>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    name: 'ResidentList',
    data: function () {
        return {
            checkedList: [],
        }
    },
    props: {
        savedResidents: Array,
    },
    methods: {
        removeResident: function () {
            this.$emit('resident-removed', this.checkedList);

            this.checkedList = [];
        }
    }
}
</script>
